attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hello!

If matters, i highly appreciate and support Your and Your government's positions and activities on ME, Zimbabwe crisis and the one created by the corrupted Bulgarian rulers which are no better that Zimbabwean one. Seems like the pressure is working and it should continue.
    Unfortunately, it seems that as far as Ahmadinedjad is president, Iran will deflect the pressure and use the talks only to buy a time.
     Sincerely : I. Ivanov, M. D., still surviving

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
